metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0548 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cleanup errors in some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access. It was discovered that on some Intel processors, partial data values previously read from a vector register on a physical core may be propagated into unused portions of the store buffer. A local attacker could possible use this to expose sensitive information.

notes.Note: tyhicks> This issue only affects Intel processors

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
